description:
As a User
    In order to use the application
    I want to Search an Item and the see Specifications
name: Search For an Item In Amazon Website

elements.name: A user should be able to search an Item

steps.name: User should navigate to Website
User enter an Item and Click on Search Button
Validate the Category For Search Item

result.error_message: CypressError: Timed out retrying after 4050ms: `cy.should()` failed because this element is detached from the DOM. `Men's S...` Cypress requires elements be attached in the DOM to interact with them. The previous command that ran was: > `cy.eq()` This DOM element likely became detached somewhere between the previous and current command. elements.name: A User search for an Item and Select Brand Name

steps.name: User should navigate to Website
User enter an Item and Click on Search Button
Select Brand options
Validate list of Items with Brand Name

elements.name: A User search for an Item and Select Price Range

steps.name: User should navigate to Website
User enter an Item and Click on Search Button
Select Price from Available option range
Validate list of Items with price range

elements.name: A User search for an Item and Enter min and max Price range

steps.name: User should navigate to Website
User enter an Item and Click on Search Button
Enter min and max price range and Click on Go button
Validate list of Items with Entered price range

elements.name: A User search for an Item and Select size For availability

steps.name: User should navigate to Website
User enter an Item and Click on Search Button
Select the size of shoes
Select one of the Item
Validate list of Items with sizes

elements.name: A User search for an Item and Select Sort by option

steps.name: User should navigate to Website
User enter an Item and Click on Search Button
Select the Sort by option
Validate sorted list of Items
